news_header: An extensive investigation into financial crimes related to the Icon real estate group has revealed damages of approximately EUR 9.5 million affecting around 300 investors.
news_text: The Police of O.bothnia have completed a comprehensive investigation into financial crimes linked to the Icon real estate group, which has been ongoing since autumn 2019. The investigation involves eight suspects accused of fraud, debtor dishonesty, and accounting offences, with damages estimated at EUR 9.5 million. Approximately 300 investors were affected, and the investigation has resulted in the collection of 15,500 pages of data over nearly five years. The case has now been forwarded to the prosecutor, marking a significant challenge in the career of investigator Tn Nisilä.
